moves.1. e4: This is one of my finest masterpieces...
moves.2... d5 3. exd5 Qxd5 4. Nc3: Like in the Scandinavian Defense I jump on the chance to give the queen a boot. Although here she cannot go to h5.
moves.5. Bb5+: I love this move. Although most of the time it gets traded off white can castle and get the rook activated quicker saving a tempo.
moves.6. Nf3 a6 7. Bxc6+: Ba4 is not very appealing to me right now and I never miss a chance to scramble an opponent's pawns.
moves.7... bxc6 8. Na4: I start my two knight attack.
moves.9... Bb7: I was hoping for Bd7?. It is a horrible blunder after Nxd7, Kxd7 and black cannot castle. (Qxd7?? is met with Nb6!)
moves.10... Qd6 11. Nc4: I start pushing his Queen around.
moves.11... Qd5 12. Qxd5: I don't like the trade but it allows...
moves.12... cxd5 13. Nab6: ? Wrong knight, dxc4, Nxa8, Bxa8 and white is down.
moves.14. Ne5: Retreat is not an option for me.
moves.14... Nf6 15. O-O: Getting my king to safety and preparing f5.
moves.15... Bd6 16. d3: I hoped for 0-0 after which i fork his rooks with Ned7
moves.17. fxe5 Ng4 18. Na4: Chasing down his pawns and setting another trap.
